director_intro.subtitle: DIRECTOR'S WELCOME
director_intro.title: A Message from the Director
director_intro.quote:
Welcome to THEI Heavy Equipment Indonesia, a part of TJM Group.
We are here as pioneers in transforming the Indonesian heavy equipment industry, carrying the spirit of being more complete, more efficient, and more professional.

THEI is not just a service provider, but a strategic partner that delivers efficiency, innovation, and added value, accompanied by bonuses and promotions worth up to hundreds of millions of rupiah.
Our program is the only one in Indonesia, and even in the world, designed to provide a different experience for our business partners.

Through our complete ecosystem: Sales, Spare Parts, Service, Rental, and Trade-In.

vision_mission.vision_text: THEI aims to be the largest and most comprehensive heavy equipment market leader in Indonesia, the official dealer for sales, spare parts, service, rental, and trade-in nationwide.
mission_points: Providing modern, well-maintained heavy equipment with high operating uptime, ready to support national projects.
Official sales of new units with a complete product selection and warranty.
Premium & after-sales services: detailed inspections, digital reports, full warranty, and certified technicians.
Enforcing a safe work system with technicians on standby 24/7.
Providing added value for corporate clients: exclusive facilities, cumulative bonuses, membership & TJM Auto Care loyalty programs.
Providing industry experts and strengthening the availability of spare parts needed by customers through our 25 branches.

core_values.subtitle: OUR FOUNDATION
core_values.title: Our Core Values
core_values.description: These values are the pillars that support every aspect of our business, guiding our decisions and shaping a strong, ethical corporate culture.

values.name: Integrity
values.description: Upholding honesty, ethics, and transparency in every business aspect to build trust.

values.name: Safety First
values.description: Prioritizing occupational health and safety (OHS) as a core culture to protect our team, clients, and environment.

values.name: Reliability
values.description: Delivering consistent, high-quality services and products to ensure smooth client operations.

values.name: Satisfaction
values.description: Committed to understanding and meeting customer needs with the best solutions that exceed expectations.

values.name: Innovation
values.description: Continuously implementing new technologies and methods to improve efficiency and provide cutting-edge solutions.

values.name: Efficiency
values.description: Focusing on providing cost-effective and time-saving solutions to help clients maximize productivity.

hsse.subtitle: TOP PRIORITY
hsse.title: Our HSSE Commitment
hsse.description: We are fully committed to a culture of safety, aiming for zero accidents and ensuring complete personal protective equipment (PPE) at all sites.
points: Regular safety training for all staff.
Routine inspection of equipment and work environments.
Implementation of international OHS (Occupational Health and Safety) standards.
A 'Safety First' program as the company's core culture.

csr.subtitle: OUR CONTRIBUTION
csr.title: Corporate Social Responsibility
csr.description: We believe in sustainable growth by giving back to the community and the environment. Our CSR initiatives focus on education, community empowerment, and environmental conservation.
activities: Certified training for heavy equipment operators.
Donation of equipment to technical schools.
The 'Green with THEI' program for tree planting initiatives.
